Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Jack = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
Tool.Enabled = true
local jackClone local jackFire
local jackSound
local jackCo local spookCo
local spookSound
local spookAOE = Vector3.new(15, 15, 15)
local laughing = false
function creep() local bvs = {} tick() local soundTable = {Jack:FindFirstChild("JackLaughSound"), Jack:FindFirstChild("JackBehindSound")} spookSound = soundTable[math.random(1, #soundTable)] if spookSound then spookSound:Play() end if jackClone and myTorso then print("here") local parts = game.Workspace:FindPartsInRegion3(Region3.new(jackClone.Position - spookAOE, jackClone.Position + spookAOE), vCharacter, 100) print(#parts) for i = 1, #parts do if parts[i] and parts[i].Parent and parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") then local torso = parts[i].Parent.Torso if torso:FindFirstChild("BV") == nil then local humanoid = parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(40) end local bv = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") bv.P = 500000 bv.maxForce = Vector3.new(bv.P, bv.P, bvP) bv.velocity = (torso.Position - myTorso.Position).unit * 100.0 bv.Name = "BV" bv.Parent = torso print("Velocity Set") end end end wait(2.0) for i = 1, #parts do if parts[i] and parts[i]:FindFirstChild("BV") then parts[i].BV:Remove() end if parts[i] and parts[i].Parent and parts[i].Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") and parts[i].Parent.Torso:FindFirstChild("BV") then parts[i].Parent.Torso.BV:Remove() end end end wait(7.0) laughing = false end
function follow() local stopped = false local bv if jackClone then bv = jackClone:FindFirstChild("FollowBV") end while jackClone and myTorso and bv do local distance = (myTorso.Position - jackClone.Position).magnitude if distance > 5.0 then stopped = false jackClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(jackClone.Position, myTorso.Position + Vector3.new(0, jackClone.Position.Y - myTorso.Position.Y, 0)) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, 0) bv.Parent = jackClone if distance > 8.0 then bv.velocity = (myTorso.Position - jackClone.Position).unit * 20.0 + Vector3.new(0, 2, 0) else bv.velocity = (myTorso.Position - jackClone.Position).unit * 20.0 * (distance/24) + Vector3.new(0, 2, 0) end else if not stopped then stopped = true bv.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) jackClone.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) bv.Parent = nil end end wait() if not laughing then laughing = true spookCo = coroutine.create(creep) coroutine.resume(spookCo) end end Jack.Transparency = 0.0 end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 20.0
if jackClone == nil then Tool.Enabled = false jackSound = Jack:FindFirstChild("JackSound") if jackSound then jackSound:Play() end
jackClone = Jack:Clone() jackClone.CanCollide = false --jackClone.Parent = vCharacter jackClone.Parent = game.Workspace jackClone.Name = "UDONTKNOWJACK"
Jack.Transparency = 1.0
jackFire = Instance.new("Fire") jackFire.Parent = jackClone jackFire.Color = Color3.new(204/255, 51/255, 0) jackFire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(153/255, 0, 51/255) jackFire.Heat = -10 jackFire.Size = 2
local jackFloat = Instance.new("BodyForce") jackFloat.force = Vector3.new(0, jackClone:GetMass() * 196.1, 0) jackFloat.Parent = jackClone jackFloat.Name = "JackFloat"
local bv = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") bv.Name = "FollowBV" bv.Parent = jackClone bv.maxForce = Vector3.new(50000, 50000, 50000) bv.P = 50000
jackCo = coroutine.create(follow) coroutine.resume(jackCo) end
wait(5.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() end
function onUnequipped() Jack.Transparency = 0.0 if jackClone then jackClone:Remove() jackClone = nil end if jackSound then jackSound:Stop() end if spookSound then spookSound:Stop() end myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
